channel.title: Skillcape problem
channel.description:
How do I put skillcapes for a skill 99? I got a client and my skillcape are 4315, 4317, 4319 ect... It's on Devolution 7.0. I really need to know how. So, people can't wear the skillcape at a skill level 1.
Thanks.

item.title: Skillcape problem
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:6, topic:256826”]Well I need more information.

Thanks.[/quote]
Ugh, go into client.java, thats called a FILE!! Hit ctrl+f and search attack untill you see shit like this:

			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) {
				return 1;

thats for attack so you would put:

			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack Cape")) {
				return 99;

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape problem
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

ok, first thing: search for a item whos not rune or addy or whatever normal items are…like a…well a dragon or something who needs def to wear. Then, you may check at client that item id, you’re supposed to found a code about def return.
the return is the required lvl for that item of that skill, i wont teach you how to fully add to ur client cuz u can learn by yourself just studing the def requirement.
good lucky, its almost all at the client, and real all if u added the capes at item.cfg and your wear item file.
bye :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 05:31:03 pm[/size][hr]tip:to study it, pay attention on how the def requirement code is, and check if theres a strenght or the skill you’re liking to add at client too, as example, you can just check the code and see that’s something named ‘defreq return true’ so search for the defreq at client and learn with that, on that way u can easy learn to code

Read full topic
